mapper.select: select s.shopname, m.menuName, rm.resMenuCnt, r.resDate, r.payPrice, p.PayType, u.uiName, u.uiHP, h.seatCnt, r.hallNo from user_info u, reservation r, reservationmenu rm, pay_category p, shop s, menu m, hall h where r.shopNo=#{num} and u.uiNo=r.uiNo and r.resNo=rm.resNo and p.PayCaNo=r.PayCaNo and s.shopNo=r.shopNo and rm.menuNo=m.menuNo and r.hallNo=h.hallNo
